member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId2.GetArchitecture2
member.summary: Gets the processor architecture as defined in the manifest.
member.param: The architecture specified for the package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageId2
member.summary: Provides access to the app package identity.
